name: Tyler's FUN Mathematic game! [THE COOLER WAY!]
name_original: Tyler's FUN Mathematic game! [THE COOLER WAY!]
description:
Previously on 2022, that one reskinned mod with new audio... it was cringe. so uhh, good news! i improved, it's decompiled, it's from 2023! more silly characters! 

can you survive the fun [and boring] mathematic game once again?? :D

 also in v2 we will have a second floor which is the art room, when theres alot of fanart, we will add it!

baldi was made by myinstants12 i think
